channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tax-related selling could set up these 11 stocks for big gains early in 2026
item.description: Insider share ownership and corporate profitability are key to finding stocks that have been temporarily sold off.

item.title: Warren Buffett gifts us 5 secrets for investing success, as he hands off Berkshire’s reins this week
item.description: Three paragraphs in a 1994 letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders reveal the top reason for Buffett’s phenomenal winning record.

item.title: ‘I experienced a catastrophic financial loss’: How options trader ‘Captain Condor’ led his followers to a $50 million wipeout
item.description: Captain Condor’s rise coincided with a boom in retail investors trading risky “0DTE” options.

item.title: Silver, gold and copper are trouncing stocks. Here’s what a key chart level suggests could be ahead for 2026.
item.description: Gold and silver are on pace for their biggest yearly percentage gains since 1979.

item.title: These undervalued stocks blew away the S&P 500 in 2025 — a 2026 repeat is likely
item.description: Valuation indicators now are extremely bearish for U.S. stocks. Non-U.S. stocks are a much better bet.

item.title: The five biggest stock winners of the year and what drove their big gains
item.description: What a year it has been, especially for the five best-performing S&P 500 stocks.

item.title: Alphabet was the big AI winner of the year. How the stock could also have a great 2026
item.description: The momentum in Alphabet shares is set to continue in 2026, according to Citizens.

item.title: Retail investors close out one of their best years ever. How they beat Wall Street at its own game
item.description: Mom-and-pop investors bought the dip at key points, giving them outsized benefits from the market's run this year.

item.title: Zoom is set up for a strong 2026. This options trade lets you benefit from gains and minimizes losses
item.description: Tony Zhang breaks down this options trade on ZM.

item.title: The ‘Dogs of the Dow’ strategy worked pretty well in 2025. Here are the stocks to target next year
item.description: Investor Kevin Simpson has his eyes set on five stocks that could outperform next year in the 'Dogs of the Dow' strategy, including newcomer Verizon.

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
